content.html:
I’ve got an old 2009 MacBook 6,1 (A1342) kicking about in my office that I’ve been playing with on and off lately. Here's a little write up of my experience playing with CloudReady Chrome OS on it.

https://blog.omgmog.net/post/installing-chrome-os-on-a-late-2009-macbook/
